name: Faith The Last Stand
description:
This is a fan game based on FAITH, a game created by Airdorf.
https://airdorf.itch.io/

What has begun as a simple joke has been turned into a arcade survival shooter game within 2 days somehow...

Music and some sound effects are from the original FAITH game, while other sound effects were made using SFXr online. Graphics are all done by me.
